data.actual_result: The status bar is not, there and instead the battery is there.
data.expected_result: The status bar should be there, and show everything
data.short_description: Status Bar missing after opening up image in browser in light theme.
data.steps_to_repro: -  Go to your user settings  - Go to appearance  - Change to light theme  - After you have hit back, go to web browser  - Change your browser to the in-app one  - Upload any image to Discord - Click on this image to open image preview  - Click again on this image and open the image in the browser by clicking on the 3 dots  - Click done after the images opens - Observe the status bar, once you are back.
